data.name: LabelTitle.Text
data.value: Welcome to the Setup Assistant Speech Recognition

data.name: Label3.Text
data.value:
Welcome. Speech recognition control SoftwareZator by voice.
In your voice, you can ask SoftwareZator to help you design a function. Say exactly what you want to achieve, and SoftwareZator offer you a list of actions that might be useful to perform this function. You can find the solution best suited to carry out your function, simply by explaining the purpose of this software.
This wizard will allow you to configure SoftwareZator to recognize your voice and learn to use it. To begin, click Next.

data.name: Label7.Text
data.value: Your voice has been detected. Click Next to continue.

data.name: Label4.Text
data.value: You will make an initial detection of your voice SoftwareZator. Connect your microphone to your computer, make sure the mute button is not activated and do not breathe directly into the microphone.

data.name: Label6.Text
data.value: Note: once your voice is detected, you can move on to the next step.

data.name: Label5.Text
data.value: « Speech recognition allows me to create software easily and without needing to code. »

data.name: Label2.Text
data.value: Read this sentence aloud in a natural way :

data.name: Label1.Text
data.value: First detection of voice in the microphone

data.name: Label15.Text
data.value: Note: after your voice is detected, you can move to the next step.

data.name: Label14.Text
data.value: To help you in your pronunciation, here you are what the software understand in real-time :

data.name: Label11.Text
data.value:
« I want. »
« I would. »

data.name: Label12.Text
data.value: Read these sentences aloud and articulating until the software include :

data.name: Label10.Text
data.value: Your voice was once detected, the wizard will now refine the configuration while you are learning to use voice recognition. SoftwareZator does not interact with your voice when you speak into your microphone. Indeed, it will deal only with sentences beginning with the following phrases : - I want - I would

data.name: Label8.Text
data.value: The trigger word of the speech recognition

data.name: Label16.Text
data.value: Note: after your voice is detected, you can move to the next step.

data.name: Label17.Text
data.value: To help you in your pronunciation, here you are what the software understand in real-time :

data.name: Label18.Text
data.value: « I want to display a message. »

data.name: Label19.Text
data.value: Read the following sentence aloud and articulating until the software finds the action and displays it in the Toolbox (fictitious) above against :

data.name: Label20.Text
data.value: With your microphone, you can search for an action or set of actions. We will see how to search for a specific action. It's actually very simple: start your sentence with "I want" or "I would", and add the name of your action. Example : I want to display a message.

data.name: Label21.Text
data.value: Search for an action

data.name: Label22.Text
data.value: Note : after your voice is detected, you can move to the next step.

data.name: Label23.Text
data.value: To help you in your pronunciation, here you are what the software understand in real-time :

data.name: Label24.Text
data.value: « I want to assign a variable and display it. »

data.name: Label25.Text
data.value: Read the following sentence aloud and articulating until the software finds the set of actions :

data.name: Label26.Text
data.value: Sometimes not knowing exactly how to realise a function. SoftwareZator 2012 will not give you the answer to all your questions, but the voice recognition will show you the right way. Explain in a sentence what you want to do and the speech recognition offer you a list of actions conducive to the fulfillment of your function. Note : only the quality and accuracy of your sentence will determine the list of actions found.

data.name: Label27.Text
data.value: Search for a set of actions

data.name: CheckBox1.Text
data.value: Activate voice recognition when SoftwareZator startup

data.name: CheckBox1.ToolTip
data.value: This option allows you to start voice recognition along SoftwareZator

data.name: Label9.Text
data.value: Congratulations! Speech recognition is now configured. Thank you for those few minutes devoted to this wizard.

data.name: Label13.Text
data.value: Voice recognition's settings
